name: Power of 2 - Strategic number matching game
name_original: Power of 2 - Strategic number matching game
description:
The Original number-match game that Topped the Chart in Canada & UK!
TO PLAY: Slide same numbers together to add them. New numbers then drop down to fill the board. Play until no more moves. YOUR GOAL: Get highest score possible!

Learn in seconds, hooked in minutes. However, it will take months if not longer to master it. This is the game that will keep your brain sharp and spinning for a lifetime!

If you enjoyed challenging puzzle games, you will love this game and see how it's strategic, addictive and challenging!

Play and Play Again to achieve personal best and compete on GameCenter Leaderboard! Want to have fun later on? Your progress is saved automatically!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
HOW TO PLAY & MASTER POWER OF 2!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Slide two identical numbers together to add them up.

- A new, random number then drops down to keep the board filled

- Play till there is no more moves

- Create larger numbers to earn more score and coins

- Coins can be used to activate power ups!

- It's a simple game that takes time to master. While a beginner's game could end in minutes, a master's game could last hours or days! You don't have to finish it in one sitting, since your progress are always saved as you play!

- To master the game, you may have to even think 10 steps ahead. Kind of like a chess game, for one person.

- With a perfect strategy, you will earn enough coins for your spending needs. In-App Purchases are available and completely optional.

- Challenge yourself and others on Gamecenter Leaderboard. This is a game that measures your brain power, and improves it as you play.
